divs: Sighting DetailsSaw a yellow light--assumed was star about 4 fists high from a seated position, guessing about 25-30 degrees(just over roof tops and a little north of the moon) Aprox location would be in the gen area of the Arch. While I was on the phone with sis, it changed to a bright yellow lighteng bolt looking thing and went straight up. A second appeared same location same behavior. About the same time a friend of mine had looked at the moon, snapped a pic and in her pic, there was a red orb. (I checked the boxes above that sorta match what I saw)
Summary: Saw yellow star like thing. then turned to a bright lightening bolt and went straight up. Saw a second same place.
